news.title: Labour MPs press Kendall on rollout of benefit changes
news.summary: The government was forced into concessions on its welfare plan following a backlash among its own MPs.

news.title: Police launch criminal investigation into Bob Vylan and Kneecap Glastonbury sets
news.summary: It follows performances from both bands on Saturday at the Glastonbury music festival in Somerset.

news.title: Israeli strike on Gaza seafront cafe kills at least 20 Palestinians, witnesses and rescuers say
news.summary: The outdoor cafe was frequently used by journalists, activists and local residents.

news.title: 'I had to investigate my own abuse case because the police failed me'
news.summary: Police are failing to properly investigate coercive control, victims and campaigners say.

news.title: Heatwave peak sees parts of UK climb to 33C
news.summary: The rise in temperature coincides with the beginning of Wimbledon and the end of the Glastonbury festival.

news.title: Almost 2,200 dog attacks on Royal Mail staff last year
news.summary: The number of incidents has risen since a drop in the pandemic, although serious injuries are down.

news.title: 92-year-old man found guilty of 1967 rape and murder
news.summary: A 92-year-old is convicted of raping and murdering Louisa Dunne in her Bristol home in 1967.

news.title: 'We're not safe here anymore' - Syria's Christians fear for future after devastating church attack
news.summary: Many Christians in Syria fear the new Islamist-led government is not doing enough to protect them.

news.title: Food delivery apps to tighten checks to stop illegal workers
news.summary: Government met with Deliveroo, Uber Eats and Just Eat after report drivers are sub-letting accounts.

news.title: The Vivienne died two days before body found, inquest hears
news.summary: James Lee Williams, 32, found fame after winning the first series of Ru Paul's Drag Race UK.
